PB went to Magnet links only, you can figure it out.

click "get this torrent". it will ask to launch the application. click OK. than another pop box will appear. give it the destination where u want to keep it. i.e. d:/desktop and press ok. dont worry if downloading is not started in torrent. it will automatically start after maximum 5 - 7 sec.
